title: Should I get velkoz or Lisandra?

replies.body: {{champion:127}} , mainly because cc wins team fights. Once you ult an enemy and your team kills him/her, you've already tipped the fight in your favor. She also has a really reliable escape, {{champion:161}}  has no escape ability.
but Vel'Koz's kiting is some of the best in the game with his E and abilities that dont impair his movement
Velkoz is more versatile. He can double as a mid-laner or a support.

It really depends. To add on to what the guy below me said, if you want to be useful in team fights through wide spread cc, play Lissandra. If you want to be useful in team fights through big wide spread damage, play VELKOZ. They're both great at team fights just through different ways. It really depends on your style.
Who can have the most impact on other lanes
That would be lissandra. Her mobility allows her to apply cc more reliably than VELKOZ.
It's much easier for Lissandra to roam, if that's what you're looking for.
lissandra is a little. lame. because shes low range and has mana issues.

{{champion:161}}  Is hard but has bs damage potential and kiting (esp with {{item:3116}} )
{{champion:127}}  Isn't super easy but much easier and has escape + initiation
